cards.summary: Use ambulatory blood pressure monitoring to address blood pressure variability
cards.detail: {{#patient}}Your recent blood pressure is above your goal and appears to be highly variable, which can indicate a health risk. Ask your care team about ordering ambulatory blood pressure monitoring or how to get better measurements from home blood pressure monitoring.{{/patient}}{{#careTeam}}In adults with suspected blood pressure variability, use Ambulatory Blood Pressure Monitoring to better understand risk. If ABPM is not available, discuss more better protocols for home blood pressure monitoring.{{/careTeam}}|https://www.ahajournals.org/doi/10.1161/HYP.0000000000000065|[ { "label": "Request Ambulatory Blood Pressure", "actions": [ "ServiceRequest for Ambulatory Blood Pressure Monitoring", "{{#patient}}Click here to request Ambulatory Blood Pressure{{/patient}}" ] } ]|at-most-one|
